0.name: 1Desmond note
0.text:
I thought I would write about our findings.
During the excavation we laid eyes upon an ancient golden mask.
I bet this is worth millions considering where it came from!

It was perhaps used by the ancient people of this moon.
Not quite sure what for however. I do feel it has a creepy look to it.
Maybe my fellow archeologist Jack might have an idea.
Here's a sketch:

1.name: 2Desmond note
1.text:
Yesterday Jack claimed to have found an ancient dagger.
He was eager to tell the crew but he does not want to let go of it.
This is quite strange behaviour for Jack so I went to investigate this blade.

He left it next to his bed while he was asleep.
I snuck in and tried to grab it but.. It was incredibly heavy.
Which is weird considering jack was able to carry it fine.
However, in his sleep, I heard him mumble about some ancient note or.. ritual..
Certainly strange.

2.name: 3Desmond note
2.text:
I AM IN SHOCK!
When Jack came in earlier he was completely covered in blood!
He has lost his mind!
He was holding the dagger in his right hand and the mask in his left held before his face.
He looked at me.
Chanting soem unrecognisable words before he walked away. Seemingly heading outside.

I am not sure if he killed an animal or..
I need to make sure Dave is ok.
I don't want to be alone with Jack the lunatic.
Maybe I should go look what's outside.

I fear the worst.

3.name: Lunatics translations
3.text:
For one to get life
One must take it

To strike a deal with the devils of junic
A symbol must be drawn with the blood of two

Their presence pointing at the center of power

Only then will you be rewarded

Let the blade be your guide
